entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
